TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Change extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Abstract class that, when implemented, describes a change to the model tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used by the undo/redo infrastructure to keep track of the changes made during an editing episode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Apply() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a derived class, applies the change to the current instance.
Docs.returns: if the change was applied to the current instance; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: When implemented in a derived class, gets a description of the change.
Docs.value: Returns a <xref:System.String> that contains a description of the change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.Change GetInverse() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a derived class, retrieves the inverse of the change.
Docs.returns: Returns a that contains the inverse of the current instance.
